content: X-DH BW Data cable hook with batwings Data cable hook with batwing clip for supporting cable bundles on a drop rod ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tool-free installation – safer and easier to handle Plenum-rated plastic saddle – increases the bearing surface area to provide the optimal bending radius and support for data cable bundles Self-closing mechanism – designed for easier, more productive cable hanging Non-slip hold – batwing grips firmly to the drop rod Applications Support for high-performance data cable bundles Support for sensitive wiring and low-voltage cables Support for cables in air handling (plenum-rated) spaces ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings Material: Carbon steel, Polyamide (PA), Flame-retardant, Plenum rated Base materials: Concrete Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings | Material | Carbon steel, Polyamide (PA), Flame-retardant, Plenum rated | Base materials | Concrete | Approvals (global) | UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2230613 - 1 Data hook with batwing clip for rod attachment - Package Size 50 pc - 2230614 - 2 Data hook with batwing clip for rod attachment - Package Size 50 pc - 2230615 - 4 Data hook with batwing clip for rod attachment - Package Size 25 pc
